text:
@realDonaldTrump They weren’t doing screenings last night. You’ve been dragging your feet on making widespread testing available or affordable. You dismissed coronavirus as a nonissue. You shook a whole bunch of hands on Friday.

Are you capable of telling the truth, President Very Stable Genius?
